website_summaries.verdict: A popular chemical-free glass cleaner that's safe, gentle, and effective on most surfaces. However, a microfiber cloth and a little elbow grease is needed for streak-free results.
pros: Plant-based ingredients are safe for the whole family
Does a good job of cleaning glass, especially when used with a microfiber cloth
Can be used to clean messes on any household surface
Green tea and lime extracts combat grime while leaving behind a pleasant, but mild fragrance
cons: Round bottle can be awkward to hold

website_summaries.verdict: Successfully removes all kinds of stains and grimy substances from nearly any surface.
pros: Uses a plant-based formula with no harsh chemicals that ensures it's safe to use in almost any situation
All ingredients clearly listed on the bottle
Uses recyclable materials in the spray bottle
Price is about average versus similar products
cons: Doesn't work as well on especially stubborn stains and soils

customer_reviews.title: My favorite cleaning product!
customer_reviews.text: I have quit using most toxic name brand chemical cleaners due to the carcinogenic nature of them. This was the first natural cleaning product I tried and have been using it for quite some time now. I use it in my kitchen on the counters & appliances. I haven't personally had a problem with it streaking anything I have used it on. I LOVE the way it smells & the fact that it isn't toxic.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Recommended in the NYTimes; try it!
customer_reviews.text: A cleaning product that you can feel good about! As a long-time user of a bleach spray cleaner, I was interested to read about this product recently in the NYTimes (in an article about refrigerator cleaning, saying something like: this is the *best*, all-purpose natural cleaner around) & wanted to try it for myself. Well, it really does work, leaving counter & stove tops streak-free. It arrived quickly, well packaged, and (an additional plus) has a very simple, pretty bottle with a high-quality spray top. The fragrance is very mild. This product has a bright future!
customer_reviews.author: Dreamweaver

customer_reviews.title: I bought this product because I was not satisfied with my existing all surface cleaner and wanted a ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because I was not satisfied with my existing all surface cleaner and wanted a more "green" product. I've just had it a couple of days. I have gone through the house from kitchen to bathroom, cleaning appliances, wood work, all the usual things in a house. So far the product has done a great job, cleans, fresh smelling, without the harsh chemicals. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Kari ML

customer_reviews.title: not for glass and comp screens
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to get rid of my glass, screen, and stainless steel cleaner, but that's not the case. It left streaks all over my stainless steel with paper towel. I had to wash microfiber cloths in the washing machine and do the z motion that they recommend in order to get rid of some of the streaks. The same thing with my TV and computer screens. The dishwasher packets are unbeatable, but this stuff is too expensive not to actually work on everything as it claims.
customer_reviews.author: ROB W.

customer_reviews.title: Leaves streaks, cleans ok.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with high expectations, especially with such high reviews, but unfortunately this product was just average for me. I really like the fact that it is a natural cleaner, it cleans most surfaces well, and the smell is light and pleasant. The problem I have with it is that I have all brand new stainless steel appliances but this product leaves streaks and I bought it because I wanted something that would NOT leave streaks. Also, the bottles are a little flimsy, the plastic is too thin and the bottles get dented too easily, I'm afraid that it will break easily.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Best Granite Cleaner Yet!
customer_reviews.text: Most cleaners I’ve found for granite don’t actually CLEAN at all, but this one by Puracy does. I gave this all-purpose cleaner a try after discovering Puracy Natural Stain Remover, their enzyme-based laundry stain-remover, which is vastly superior to any other I’ve used. I love this cleaner for granite! It does a beautiful job of both cleaning and shining my granite, and I couldn’t be happier with it. Oh- and the smell is light and fresh! I just hope my husband doesn’t discover this stuff- it’s way too expensive for him to use for all his projects...
customer_reviews.author: Shops-a-lot

customer_reviews.title: It’s not bleach spray - but that’s a good thing!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these after reading something about incidence of lung cancer are more highly correlated to cleaning products than cigarette smoking! Honestly, who knows if that’s true - but it was enough to make me think about the millions of times I’ve wiped down my counter tops with a bleach spray... These do the trick. Are they as good as bleach? No, but then again you don’t always NEED bleach. I use these for my everyday counter top wipe down. For stubborn stains or disinfecting after cutting raw chicken (for example), I still use bleach. The smell is fresh and clean smelling
customer_reviews.author: Andrea G.

customer_reviews.title: Questionable ingredients, Strong Offensive Smell
customer_reviews.text: Alcohol Ethoxylates - questionable, potentially harmful ingredient according to ewg.org even if they are plant derived. Couldn't stand such a strong offensive smell that lingers, so tried to rinse it off using a damp paper towel and could see the residue coming off. I had to ventilate the air and ended up having to make an effort to remove the effect of this cleaner. Don't like the idea of having to use microfiber cloth every time because that means I have to wash the cloth every time!
customer_reviews.author: JB18

customer_reviews.title: Gentle on wood floors, but strong enough for tree sap
customer_reviews.text: I ordered Puracy's All Purpose cleaner in preparation for a new puppy joining our household. The Wirecutter listed it as a recommended product, and I have to agree. We've used it dozens of times to clean up pee puddles on our wood floors, leaving them clean and undamaged. On a whim, I tried Puracy's on my car windshield to remove some tree sap and it worked great! It took 2-3 passes, but I could see clearly out of my windows afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Alyss N

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have asthma and allergies, so I'm always on the lookout for natural cleaning products that are effective. I bought these specifically because people commented on how this left their stainless surfaces streak-free. Well, I don't know what brands of stainless they have, or what cloths they use, but on my LG fridge and dishwasher, I am left with a streaky mess. I've tried lint-free paper towels, a clean soft cotton cloth, a microfiber cloth, to no avail--I'm still left with streaks. It does get grime off, and it smells very good. I'm just disappointed that for the very reason I bought this. it doesn't deliver.
customer_reviews.author: Goodhart Girl

customer_reviews.title: Do not use on glass it will ruin it
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner is awful. I used it to clean my windshield and it left a residue that makes it where I can barely see out of it when there is any light pointed at it, like from a passing car. I have washed the window multiple times and tried several other products to remove it, it's gotten better but the residue is still there. Do not use on glass
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly...we love it!
customer_reviews.text: I managed to run out of disinfecting spray and wipes during this pandemic and of course went to amazon when of course I could not find any in stores. I ordered this since it was all that was available (even though I wanted something with a disinfectant). Well I love it, and so does my husband who was upset I had ordered something with no disinfectant. He liked it so much he ordered 4 more bottles. It smells lovely (not obnoxious) and cleans so many surfaces really well. We are converts!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Value for money natural cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really fantastic cleaning product: I deducted one star as it doesn't clean stainless like it says it will, mine smears when I use this on it despite buffing off in a circular pattern. Everything else, from the shower to toilets to the counters, it cleans wonderfully. It has a clean, fresh scent that is not overpowering even in an enclosed space. It cleans sticky messes up surprisingly well as I found out when the inverter on our fridge went out and everything defrosted. Dissolves oil and grease no problem. I am very happy with this product, so happy I stuck it on my subscribe and save.
customer_reviews.author: stuckintheusa

customer_reviews.title: Love this cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner works amazingly well on every surface I’ve cleaned with it! I’ve been trying to find a natural cleaner that works, including mixing my own, and this is head & shoulders above the rest! It’s replaced my stainless cleaner, shower cleaner, window cleaner and wood cleaner. Using a microfiber cloth works best. If my SS stove top is really greasy, I start with paper towels and finish with the cloth. I’m so happy I found this product!
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: AWSEOME CLEANER!!
customer_reviews.text: I use it on EVERYTHING! Bathroom: granite counter top, toilet , shower, mirror, kitchen: corean countertops, SS fridge, dishwasher, microwave...... misc wood/glass furniture ... outdoor grill and patio furniture.. car dash and doors (inside).. really just about everything. No need to have separate bottles anymore for the various surfaces and I had a butt ton. wood dusting, wood oil, SS cleaner, glass/mirror cleaner, toilet bowel cleaner, shower cleaner, corian and granite cleaner and polisher, dash cleaner/rejuvenator, ........ . Really love this product!
customer_reviews.author: JMill

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Two stars given for the fact that the procruct is plant based and chemical free. Leaves smudges and smears on windows and mirrors, doesn’t smell “fresh” smells more like an old woman’s strong perfume, I believe or hope it’s cleaning my stone counters safety. So far no grout breakdown
customer_reviews.author: Julie Rose Olivier

customer_reviews.title: Cleans beautifully without chemicals.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is a marvel. Truly streak-free when used with a microfiber cloth, smells good, seems ridiculously non-toxic. Cleans our granite countertops better than anything I’ve ever used.
customer_reviews.author: RDD

customer_reviews.title: Does Clean Well.  Not a disinfectant.
customer_reviews.text: Actually I was wrong about how it cleans. It doesn't disinfect BUT it cleans dirt very well. And it smells v. good. The one pump which works, works v. well. So I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: See Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Works well with a truly pleasant smell!
customer_reviews.text: I had to specifically look this one up too leave a review because I love it!! The scent is so pleasant and not overpowering or chemically. It does work beautifully! I'm picky about glass cleaner and this works without leaving any steaks! I also used a black light on a few objects and it cleaned away the spots! I'm very happy with it! I have the concentrate as well for mopping, I can't wait to try that one!
customer_reviews.author: Stainlessrat

customer_reviews.title: My new GO-TO cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I really love this cleaner. I have granite counter tops and they do not streak with this easy to use cleaner. I use it on windows and glass tabletop (separate cloth). Also on my fine wood furniture, in my bathroom on all surfaces, and on my electronics around the house. It works fantastic. I am very happy. The scent is light and clean and not overpowering. I like that I can use it around the kids and our pets safety. Its a great value. I recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Lodin

customer_reviews.title: Really impressed
customer_reviews.text: I am always skeptical of "green" things, but I am very happy with this. I needed something to wipe up the counters and stove each day. I normally used the brand name bleach wipes, but they were out, so I tried this. These clean better than the brand name bleach wipes and the smell is so much better! And a little bit goes a long way. I will be purchasing this again, whenever I actually run out.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant as citrus bothers my eyes, but this just smells clean. What is amazing is that I use a lot of essential oils and magnesium oil spray and other products that gunk up the vanity, especially where it sneaks into areas I don't notice. I have struggled to clean this for YEARS with various cleaners. I sprayed this product on the tacky area, waited a few minutes, and it wiped right off. So glad I saw the reviews for this and took the plunge. Excited to try the carpet cleaner next...high expectations! Now to see what else they sell.
customer_reviews.author: Truth Seeker

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: One suggestion for the store owner about shipping your liquid products. I really enjoy using your products and hope that you will be offering the lavender refill soap in a bag soon. Great product. One thing though, this recent delivery of the multi-purpose spray cleaners were leaking from the top in the box when it was delivered. : ( I did not lose much of the product but, it would be better to place liquids in a plastic bag in case of leakage. The mailing box had wet marks from the product.
customer_reviews.author: J.B.

customer_reviews.title: Green, non-toxic, great for everyday cleaning
customer_reviews.text: This works well as an all-purpose cleaner for everyday use. I use it primarily in the kitchen, on the countertops and appliances. While different fragrances appeal to different people, I find this has a pleasant, clean and fairly mild scent. Occasionally, I need to use a more aggressive (and more toxic) product for deep cleaning, but most of the time, I find that spraying this Puracy cleaner and letting it sit for a while, then using a scrubber sponge followed by the wiping with a microfiber cloth, as recommended, in a tight “Z” pattern works fine.
customer_reviews.author: M. Schindel

customer_reviews.title: really works well
customer_reviews.text: To be honest, I bought this cleaning spray product because I could not get any of my usual more familiar brand name products. I was skeptical that it would clean very well. To my surprise it does actually clean very well - so well that it will be my go-to cleaning spray from now on. In addition to cleaning power, the price is right, the bottle is taller rather than wider so it takes up less space in my cupboard, and the trigger is easy to pull with my arthritic fingers. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Cole

customer_reviews.title: I don't know that it has ever looked that good under my hand
customer_reviews.text: This product impresses me. I generally use vinegar and hydrogen peroxide as main cleaning products because my allergies are horrendous, and I have severe sensitivity to sprays. However, I want our home to be clean. I just finished using Puracy to scrub down the kitchen (son graduated from college yesterday; I am decompressing). It worked marvelously. I sprayed the shiny stovetop and literally looked twice when I wiped it off. I don't know that it has ever looked that good under my hand. This has become a new staple in my bathroom and kitchen. I especially like that two bottles were included, or I would be running up and down the stairs after it.
customer_reviews.author: SKML

customer_reviews.title: Leaves Streaks
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because of the high rating and I’m not sure why it did other than it smells wonderful. It left streaks on every surface I used it to clean with and I tried it on four plus different surfaces. Would not by again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not streak free
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this product but it is definitely not streak free, as advertised. It leaves a “film” like substance on my HD laminate countertops and although it appears to clean glass, when I shower and the mirror gets foggy you can see all the streaks- and then the streaks stay there once the mirror dries. (And yes, I run the fan...I just like very hot showers so my bathroom gets steamy regardless)
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Louise

customer_reviews.title: great scent!
customer_reviews.text: This brand was on the list of approved COVID-19 killing multi-surface sprays and so I was happy to find a natural way to clean and it's scent is pleasant and not overbearing :) I ordered the refill just recently because I'm a fan of this product and scent. I think I've bought it 3 times so far!
customer_reviews.author: B. Kennel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with this all purpose cleaner. IT WORKS! I have used it on the bath tub/shower, glass shower doors, counter tops, wall smudges, kitchen floor tiles and OH-MY-GOSH does wonders on dried spills on hardwood floors. After trying it on a few surfaces, I immediately ordered two more spray bottles so I don't run out. But the best thing about it is it is pet safe. I am in the process of gathering all my other household cleaners to remove them and only use Puracy All Purpose Cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra K.

customer_reviews.title: Mild smell, not overpowering and all natural ingredients, yet DOES THE JOB WELL!
customer_reviews.text: I love the natural ingredients and have used this product in my kitchen and bath on countertops, counters, tub, shower, door-knobs, kitchen stove, oven, microwave, refrigerator, and anything that needs a bit of work. The scent is very mild and clean smelling with hint of herbal ingredient. It works great to make most surfaces clean. I would definitely recommend. NOTE: on deep cleaning, you may need something more powerful. I find if I use this regularly, I seldom need to do the deep cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: UTblue

customer_reviews.title: Safe for the environment, children and pets
customer_reviews.text: Better for the environment, safe to use on any surface, 100% kid-safe and pet-safe. You can use it on stainless steel surfaces, but you have to use micro-fiber cloth, and a special wiping pattern to get the streak-free look they advertise. I had a problem with the smell left behind after using the product, apparently some people like it and some people don't. I didn't, and the company promptly refunded my purchase price. I gave the product 5 stars because customer service went above and beyond to make sure I was satisfied. Well done, Katie !!
customer_reviews.author: mike32927

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Yesterday was the first time using this product and it will be my only cleaning product i use besides some bleach here and there. I used it on windows, the stove top, the microwave, the bathroom sink/toilet and to clean some glass knick nacks around the house. Very impressed with the streak free shine it leaves. The smell is nice although im not to kean on it. But on the other hand id rather smell this product then pure chemical. Shipping was fast, the products came undamaged and for an all purpose cleaner i believe the price is just right. So glad i decided to give this product a chance!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Rauch

customer_reviews.title: All I need!
customer_reviews.text: I was in need of some all purpose cleaner for our home, as I prepare for our baby's arrival. I was looking for something safe but hadn't done much research at all as I normally do. I took a shot in the dark with purchasing Puracy Natural All Purpose cleaner and I must say, I'm so happy I did! I've cleaned everything with it! From windows, mirrors, granite countertops, flat stove top, to bookcases, door handles, light switch plates and the walls were people often touch. I've cleaned around my children and family dog without the worry of them inhaling toxic fumes. As advertised, it's all natural and smells great. I'll be sticking to this cleaner from now on!
customer_reviews.author: CMareeJay5

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually write reviews, but this product is pretty wonderful. My kitchen hasn't looked so good in a long time. It easily cut thru the grease on my black stove top, left my ceramic tile counters sparkling and streak free, and made my ovens and dishwasher fronts look like new--EASILY and FAST. It also has a pleasant mild aroma. I didn't have a microfiber cloth to use (which is what they recommend), and just used heavy duty paper towels, which worked fine. I will look for a cloth, tho.
customer_reviews.author: B.G.

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: I like this kitchen spray. I’ve bought it several times over the past few years. I really like that it is natural and doesn’t contain toxic ingredients like most cleaners. It doesn’t have an overwhelming smell or cause irritation like many other cleaners do either. There is a slight black pepper smell to it imo. I’m not sure why because that’s not in the ingredients. But it’s not to its detriment, just something I’ve always noticed. I also like the normal spray nozzle as some cleaners come out all funky. It cleans well and doesn’t irritate. This might sound random, but it also kills ants that have found their way into my house.
customer_reviews.author: AnonymousRooster

customer_reviews.title: Leaves streaks and hazy film
customer_reviews.text: While this smells fine to me, it leaves a residue and streaks on every surface I’ve tried it on. I am shocked people would say otherwise. I wanted to love this but I always wind up having to rinse my surfaces over and over to get the film/residue off after using it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: made my sink look worse
customer_reviews.text: I read many reviews before ordering this. Once i used it, it actually made my sink look worse! I was so disappointed. I currently have a product that works well but it is time consuming. I was wanting something to spray on, wipe and go. does not happen. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: CKHGTV

customer_reviews.title: Greatest and safest cleaning solution out there
customer_reviews.text: This I have to say is the ABSOLUTE BEST cleaning solution on the market. I use it for walls, stains, carpet (diluted with water), just a few little spritzes and everything just comes clean with little scrubbing involved. I HIGHLY recommend this product. And it's safe to use around your pets so that's an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: coolncute

customer_reviews.title: Chemical free magic for babies things
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always used the non scented version of this item but ever since everyone went a little crazy after covid this is all I could find and it’s almost as great as my original favorite. The smell isn’t super strong at all and it cleans my babies high chair, toys and playing areas in a breeze while I feel safe because these products are chemical free.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Geary

customer_reviews.title: works well and smells good. Puracy donated products to Puerto Rico
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about the product when I first purchased, all products make promises, but many don't deliver. I used the multi-purpose cleaner along with my other products and found I was reaching for the Puracy multi-purpose cleaner first after a couple of months. Now, I'm just going to use this product for cleaning, I feel it's healthier, works well and smells good. Puracy donated products to Puerto Rico, Texas and areas that were damaged by a hurricane, I commend them for that effort. I think it's important that the products I use are not only safe and effective, but are environmentally friendly . I recommend this company and it's products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for AVOIDING chemicals and sickness
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these because all other cleaners were making me sick for 24 hours after I cleaned my bathroom. The smell of these does not make me sick and also not having chemicals is making me feel better too. I just did a first run wipe down In my bathroom. It really does work on glass... NO STREAKS. I really liked it for counter tops, sink, and the tables and furniture in my bed room. I could tell it may not be very strong for the shower residue but I feel like if a sponge instead of a paper towel wipe down I will get better results. So far I'm a happy buyer.
customer_reviews.author: MLM0822

customer_reviews.title: Multipurpose Spray works well.
customer_reviews.text: I think this product and it cleans well for my needs. It works well for my counters and glass cleaning needs. I haven’t done a bacterial test or anything but the ingredients are know to kill germs. I also like the company. When I initially tried the lotion it had a bad smell but the company recently sent me a free lotion to try and I love it. I appreciate that the company followed up. It’s unscented and more importantly hydrating
customer_reviews.author: JenzReviewz161616

customer_reviews.title: It really is the best.
customer_reviews.text: Yeah, this stuff really is the best. I had what I thought was a clean kitchen. I used the Honest multi-surface cleaner in grapefruit until I couldn't get my hands on it locally anymore. I considered buying it online, but from what I have read in reviews both on Amazon and the Honest website, they have changed the formula, and it is not as good as it was. Based on Amazon's reviews, I bought this. I used it in my "clean" kitchen and was appalled at what it picked up. Pleased - but appalled at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: luvtoread

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I am allergic to the fragrance in most cleaners and am always on the lookout for products that don't trigger my asthma. The product also has to satisfy my cleaning lady. This all purpose cleaner works for both of us. The scent is faint and not sweet, for which I am thankful. It cleans very nicely, and doesn't leave a residue. It doesn't polish the floor the way my previous floor cleaner did, but that is a tiny thing in view of its other pluses. I think I've finally found a cleaner that satisfies both my cleaning lady and me and we will stick with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have now tried this product on tile, laminate, plastic, electronics, walls, windows, sealed granite, leather, and anything else I could find that wasn't porous. I absolutely love this product! It works well. Needs no rinsing. Leaves no residue. It is all natural plant-based (citric acid) and safe. Plus, it smells good without being too strong. Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: L. Capell

customer_reviews.title: Great All Purpose Cleaner for the Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Love this, it smells really good! It is all natural and cleans Granite and Stainless Steel well. I spray it right on the counter and clean it with a moist sponge and dry with a towel. I still use Lysol wipes to clean after cooking with raw meat or eggs but I rely on this cleaner for my every day cleaning. Hope this review was helpful, let me know if you have any questions!
customer_reviews.author: The Fair Critic

customer_reviews.title: Cleans EVERYTHING
customer_reviews.text: This is truly an all purpose cleaner. I clean my bathroom, shower, sink, tub, windows, glass, countertops and all my stainless steel appliances. It replaces probably 4-5 other cleaners I normally use. I would 100% recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for surfaces you want to have a clean sparkle without the shine
customer_reviews.text: I love using this on my wood furniture and on the dash of my car. Unlike furniture polish or leather cleaners it does not leave a fake shine and leave a subtle clean sparkle... just like when it was new.
customer_reviews.author: L. L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Natural Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Was using other natural name brands and decided to give this one a try since it was a local company. So far, it seems to be doing the job...will continue to purchase. Interested in trying other products from their line.
customer_reviews.author: T. H. Werner

customer_reviews.title: Very effective New Era cleaner
customer_reviews.text: My kitchen was less grimy than usual when I received the product, so have yet to try on the worst of my messes. However, it has done a great job with surface stains on white counters while leaving neither streaks nor a tacky, slippery feel. Also, it has removed most of the hard water mineralization left by droplets and small puddles of water on the counter--without scrubbing. All in all very happy and the product seems to accomplish more with fewer pumps than traditional cleaners. Now if it also handles blueberry stains, it will deserve 10 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This works so well on all surfaces. I used it on my mirrors and it left them streak free and with such a nice shine. I cleaned my frosted glass candle holders and it removed some set in dust that I didn't realize was on them from using my old Pledge spray. I also use it for a quick clean on my sinks and it makes them shiny. I am happy I final found an all natural cleaning spray that really works.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie My Lady

customer_reviews.title: How it works for me.
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. I read about it in an article on Housekeeping hints in the New York Times. I ordered one bottle to try it. Now it is two bottles every 6 weeks; I use it for all spots, accidents, cat discrepancies, coffee and wine stains, etc. all. I have one bottle under my kitchen sink, one on the shelf in my utility room. I have a condo with expensive and beautiful oriental rugs. Any cat accidents, I mean all kinds, picked up then sprayed and wiped and/or lifted depending on the problem are handled beautifully. Never a spot remains. I use this product for literally everything I clean. Yea to those who made this available.
customer_reviews.author: Bernice McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Best cleaning product and smell i have ever used
customer_reviews.text: I just cleaned my bathroom with this product! I loved it. The bottle sprays really nicely. I could see and feel how clean everything was and i made sure my tub and such were nasty to make sure this really worked. It worked better and smelled better than using my lysol products. I didn't have any streaks on my mirror or pictures. I truly impressed by this product. Even scrubbed the floor with it. Gotta try it for yourself
customer_reviews.author: Rana H.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, Versatile cleaner!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the reviews and it does not disappoint! Pleasant “clean” fragrance, not overpowering. Cleans without streaking. I was especially impressed with how it cleaned my cook top. It basically is a black glass cook top with gas burners I usually use a product especially designed for this. After I clean it I have to buff with a microfiber cloth. I was shocked when this product in one easy step! It works great for stainless steel appliances too!!! Also cleans glass beautifully. Even my glasses!!! Defiantly will buy it again!!!!
customer_reviews.author: waytagodarius

customer_reviews.title: There's a reason Puracy has so many positive reviews.....
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. + It works. We use it on many different surfaces including granite. + The fragrance is understated and clean - not overpowering or persistent + Great price, even with shipping + Does seem like chemicals or clinical. We just ordered more to ensure we don't run out. We also ordered the laundry detergent.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely LOVE this product. I have proved people wrong saying they need Clorox to get mold and mildew off of wooden columns. By using this perfect cleanser, it assures you that no flowers or grass will die from chemicals, also little beneficial insects, frogs, lizards, etc. will live. ❤️ Inside it works like a charm on birdcage, countertops, floor, appliances, truly better than 409 type sprays. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: THIS PRODUCT IS GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I found this product because NYTimes had an article on the best products for your home in terms of cleaning ability and this was rated best. I was also thrilled to discover it is vegan, and otherwise environmentally friendly as well. It smells really nice (I don't like any other cleaners). I highly recommend in every way and will now try more of their products. Thank you Puracy for a product that works really well, is pleasant to use and doesn't harm our environment.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Perlman

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Smells nice, works good on most hard surfaces, except for glass & stainless. Left horrible dark streaks on all my appliances, which took a while to finally get off. And now I'm noticing haze & steaks on my glass. Not too happy, especially since it's not cheap. I'll be trying something new next time.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Dziedzic

customer_reviews.title: You’ll never need any other multi surface cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many other natural plant based cleaners and this one by far is the absolute best. Because it is a multi surface type cleaner I don’t have to clutter my cupboard with several different ones. I used it on my ceramic tile floors and they came sparkling clean with no residue. It doesn’t have a harsh chemical type smell either. I hope this never goes out of stock because I will never need to use any other product for cleaning. In fact I have 2 bottles but I’m ordering 2 more today just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Best non-toxic cleaner for children/pets/sensitive individual without strong lingering smell
customer_reviews.text: Nice natural scent of mint, rosemary that’s not overpowering and does not linger. This is one of the best non-toxic products for anyone that cares and for little children and animals alike. It’s not antibacterial, however it’s better this way as it doesn’t have the caustic chemicals and decreases the change of causing bacterial resistance. It does a great job cleaning regardless.
customer_reviews.author: Watson

customer_reviews.title: Especially great for mirrors!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product, it is very easy to use, has a nice gentle smell (that doesn’t trigger my allergies), and is truly great for streak free mirrors/windows. It cleans better than those ammonia streak free foams. I was using Meyers clean multi surface before this but the smell was so strong it made me sneeze so I will definitely use this instead from now on. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Susy

customer_reviews.title: Super cleaner, and no steaks.
customer_reviews.text: I first tried the spot remover and loved it so much, I purchased the laundry detergent and the multi-surface cleaner. The only thing I have used it for yet is the counter-top (black granite). Product worked great and didn't streak at all. This company has become my new best friend. Will definitely continue to use these products!
customer_reviews.author: JaDe

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cleaner ever! The smell... .omg, the smell is so great! I want to clean my whole house in it. While I am not sure how well it does with mirrors, it seems to clean everything else very good! Very happy I found this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jinxie

customer_reviews.title: Not for reflective surfaces, leaves film.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this. Had it worked then it would have been perfect but my mirror is so foggy after using this product. I thought I didn't do a good enough job wiping it and got a microfiber cloth and I would polish my mirror and it got foggy with in minutes again.
customer_reviews.author: Olof

customer_reviews.title: Great for daily use
customer_reviews.text: This is our favorite natural cleaning product for every day use! It isn’t great for disinfecting or for deep cleaning. We use it for wiping kitchen counters daily and cleaning up little messes, and it works well. The scent is pleasant, and not too strong. I feel safe using it around my family.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Corry

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down my favourite cleaning product right now and I’ve tried many environmentally friendly ones: Snap, Mrs. Meyers, Seventh generation, Method etc. Puracy seems to be the only one you can really use on different surfaces and still get a good clean. I used it in the shower and it did not leave marks on the glass. The scent is also soothing and fresh! Will definitely be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Rsquared

customer_reviews.title: Best cleaner!!
customer_reviews.text: This really is a great cleaner. I don't usually write reviews, especially for a cleaner, but this is my go-to product for everything now. It's great on my granite countertops, I know it isn't harming them, and I know it isn't harming me when I smell it. And it does smell great! Just brought it with me to my son's college dorm to clean everything before he moved in. Also works on windows and glass really well.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C.

customer_reviews.title: This is a fabulous working/smelling product and I couldn't be more pleased. I think we are living in a time ...
customer_reviews.text: I just opened a green cleaning business focusing on residential and small businesses. I am very eco-conscious and only use plant-derived cleaners. This is a fabulous working/smelling product and I couldn't be more pleased. I think we are living in a time where folks are becoming more educated about controlling their environment indoors, since very little can be controlled outside. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: LissySha

customer_reviews.title: Great, non-toxic, kitty asthma-approved cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: I recently changed cleaning products due to my 1 year old kitten being diagnosed with asthma. My previous cleaners induced an asthma attack for him. I LOVE that this product is non-toxic, all natural, CLEANS WELL without leaving streaks, and did NOT cause my kitty to have an asthma attack. It has a fresh, crisp/clean scent with a floral note to it. The scent last for maybe 10 minutes and goes away. I will be purchasing more in the future. Thank you for this amazing and life saving product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Nangle

customer_reviews.title: Just a AWESOME product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this product, and also the laundry spot remover. Never used a spot remover as good. I will most surely re-order both of them. I am also going to try their other products. Can't beat natural products for you and your home. My husband has life threatening severe allergic reactions, so this stuff is a God-send to us! Thank you Puracy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eyes wide openTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using for the past few days on high-end marble and quartzite counter tops, as well as surrounding surfaces (anything I look up and see a mark on!), and it has done a fantastic job on everything. I also love that this product is made in my hometown of Austin, Texas! I wish they offered the product in alternative scents but maybe that is in development!
customer_reviews.author: AmandaTex

customer_reviews.title: My main go to for cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product so much that I ended it with subscription... I can use anywhere, no harsh chemicals or smells. Of course for bad stains bleach always works better but I avoid bleach unless I have to work on a bad stain... my main go to for cleaning
customer_reviews.author: Ayca

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something that didn't smell chemically so I stumbled upon this and decided to try it. It is amazing! It got stuck on grime on my glass stove top off, grease, some sticky stuff that ended up on my counter. It makes the house smell amazing. I also used it to dust some furniture and it did great. HIGHLY recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Reed

customer_reviews.title: Good for small jobs but not the one you probably want it for.
customer_reviews.text: I think the product is good for a extra clean before someone comes over but for deep clean this isn't right for it. I had to use spic and span all-purpose spray instead on small stains. It sucks because it does smell really good and fresh but it just doesn't get all the jobs done. Plus. One of the bottles came broken. I don't know how that worked but I guess it's just my bad luck.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Cleaves

customer_reviews.title: Effective and Smells Great
customer_reviews.text: This product gets the job done. I recently moved into a very small, one-room temporary lodging for work where the metal walls were caked in a layer of grime from years of build-up. I wanted a product that would get the walls clean without harsh chemicals that I would otherwise be breathing in for days afterwards in my tiny living space, and this was just the thing. It cut the grime and left behind a nice, fresh smell! There is no stainless steel in my current "residence", but when I return home I'll be trying this product on my stainless appliances and see how well it works.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This product is simply amazing- I feel like I’m allergic to everything and it looks so pretty and soft from the outside but this stuff has the most gentle deep clean! Highly recommend! Loved using on my pine surfaces!
customer_reviews.author: Kass

customer_reviews.title: A great, plant-based, all-purpose cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for over a year now and love its cleaning power, grease-cutting ability and fresh scent. I use it in the kitchen and in the bathroom - really in any room. I use it especially on my glass-top stove. If something is stuck on, I just spray on a bit and let it sit for a minute or two. It cleans oil spatters and food spatters perfectly. I use it both with microfiber towels and paper towels. I have even given bottles of it to my neighbor, who also loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Hovis

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a cleaning product that is effective but not harsh. I have tried several brands, but this one wins the prize. It is both effective and pleasant to use and has a nice lavender scent. And it is not loaded with chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Coach

customer_reviews.title: My favorite!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this stuff. I wanted to save money and learn to make my own cleaner. 2 months later I gave up and bought this pack again. I missed the smell so much, it makes my house feel modern, clean and fresh. It's amazing for windows and Glass. I use it on my leather couch too.
customer_reviews.author: Kayte

customer_reviews.title: GREAT stuff - speaking as a housecleaner
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my housecleaning business. I was increasingly worried about the chemicals I was constantly inhaling, and I switched over to Norwex microfiber for most things, and Puracy cleaner for tougher jobs like shower floors that took more elbow grease than I have to spare using just microfiber. Puracy works so well. The smell is pleasant and fresh, and my clients appreciate how clean their homes look, feel, and smell. I haven't tested the streak-free properties on mirrors and such but that's on my list for this week (I normally just use a Norwex cloth with plain water to get mirrors and other glass streak-free clean).
customer_reviews.author: K. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: To start, when I received it, was very poorly packaged and one bottle broke and it was a mess. I have tried it on various things around the house, particularly my stainless steel appliances, and it streaked. The smell is not pleasant. I am not going to order this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: This product is Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product!!! It works on everything I have found including glass. It smells lovely. I reccomend it to everyone!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pauline Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Will purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Been trying to go with natural products since I didn't like my last reaction to bleach. This is my first go at it. I like it. I was surprised at how well it handled the grease in my kitchen sick and counters. I'll be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: S.M.

customer_reviews.title: Cleans Well, No Streaks
customer_reviews.text: This product cleans well and doesn't leave streaks on our stainless appliances and glass-top range. Will continue to use!
customer_reviews.author: Jon M Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product to use around the house. We love puracy!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome cleaner. I have used it on the counters, bathroom floor and tub. It cleans really well and has a great scent. It definitely stacks up to the “chemical cleaners” without the worry. Definitely is good if you have kids in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Very effective
customer_reviews.text: I have used a lot of cleaners and this one beats everything I’ve ever tried. I have two small boys so messes are made all.day.long. I actually look forward to cleaning because I love how Puracy picks up every remnant, even stains in the first wipe. It’s super satisfying to see how effective it is and not full of harmful chemicals either!
customer_reviews.author: ErinCH

customer_reviews.title: Sexy cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I didn't really believe the online reviews of cleaning products but took a chance. Love it. I keep buying more, it disappears fast in our house.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Logic

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy using this cleaner around my home. The smell is very pleasant and not harmful towards kids and pets. I clean my bath tub and counter tops with this product and si far it seems to work well. I'll definitely repurchase in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Puracy Cleaner Review
customer_reviews.text: I'm not impressed with the stainless steel cleaning ability of this cleaner. I used it exactly as recommended/prescribed on the bottle; however, it leaves major streaks on my stainless appliances. I've searched high and low for a "streak-free" ss cleaner and each one I've tried has failed me. Because of the description, I thought that this cleaner would be a winner, but it is not. It cleans other surfaces okay so I'll keep it; however, if you are strictly in search of an ss cleaner that does not leave streaks, this is not for you.
customer_reviews.author: S. Falcone

customer_reviews.title: Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: The smell is amazing, so calm and fresh! Actually WORKS to remove grime on countertops and windows. I have the laundry stain spray and that too works like nothing I’ve ever purchased. Love supporting a local company in Austin!
customer_reviews.author: Troutgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaner. I'm super sensitive to chemicals and this didn't bother me at all.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this stuff. It cleans well, and since I am so sensitive to chemicals, I can actually use it! I couldn't even use simple green without feeling crappy after I somehow developed major chemical sensitivities. It does a great job on my oven, bathroom etc. I pretty much use it as an all purpose cleaner. The smell is nice and light. I would recommend and buy again. Its well packaged and totally worth it, plus who wants to carry loads of cleaners . These get delivered right to my door. YAY!
customer_reviews.author: Lin K.

customer_reviews.title: poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: I can't say much for the product itself, because I haven't used it much yet. However, no problems so far and peace of mind that it's natural since I own two dogs. Packaging of product is terrible, the spray "straw-thingy" broke. Plus, it was too long, I had to cut it to make it fit. See picture.
customer_reviews.author: Susie An

customer_reviews.title: Natural product is the Best
customer_reviews.text: Great cleaning product, no harsh chemicals Nd gentle on hands! I have always been a holistic person when it comes to skincare or cleaning products. My body and skin are sensitive to the fumes and can easily detect products that contain chemicals. I truly appreciate the Puracy maker for inventing this safe and natural cleaning product!
customer_reviews.author: Di Da Di

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well
customer_reviews.text: Just too expensive...I try a lot of different products because of the pandemic....I will spend more money if item will disinfect...this one is not a disinfectant...won’t buy again...too expensive... ro, Meyers just as good and costs a lot less
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Marks

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I use this cleaner for my kitchen and it's great! Leaves a fresh scent and is safe on my countertops. I like that the ingredients are natural. I have not used it to remove any very tough stains, but it has so far worked great on everyday spills in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Very efficient
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because I did not want to use heavy chemical products when cleaning my fridge and microwave. Its very light with a mild smell so I was afraid it would not be as effective in cleaning tough spills or stains. But I am pleasantly surprised at how easy and efficient it has been at this task. And there's no soapy or chemically residue. The only helpful tip is that, as per the instructions, it works much better with a microfiber dishcloth than just any regular dishcloth.
customer_reviews.author: DS Review

customer_reviews.title: When diluted its an effortless stainless cleaner
customer_reviews.text: It’s a perfect cleaner I love it it’s light scent is refreshing but not overbearing safe for my pets and my allergies. One thing i just discovered accidentally and this is really amazing FOR THE BEST STAINLESS CLEANER DILUTE WITH WATER IN A SEPARATE BOTTLE JUST 50-75% parts water 25% solution and it is an EFFORTLESS STAINLESS CLEANER
customer_reviews.author: Amy L Osterwise

customer_reviews.title: Very good product. No chemicals but cleans and disinfects very good I’ll keep using this
customer_reviews.text: I like the product. Easy to use very good cleaner. Only thing they need to box it more secure. My last order arrived leaking out the box. Barley had any padding and also those big bubble one are not strong enough. They bust easily.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: A new favorite
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. This makes the room smell so good. And I believe it clean better then Windex and Clorox. I am replacing all my cleaner products and will be starting to buy this brand as my other products run out. Nice to have something natural that really works.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy in VA

product_meta.title: Puracy All Purpose Cleaner, Household Natural Multi-Surface Spray, 25 Ounce (2 Pack)
feature_bullets: “The Best All-Purpose Cleaner” – The New York Times
SUPERIOR RESULTS: Guaranteed to safely clean any hard surface without streaking

CREATED BY DOCTORS: Developed & Tested by PhDs, the plant-based formula effectively removes food, soda, juice, grease, oil, sugar, pet accidents, fingerprints, footprints, lipstick, tree sap, grime, adhesives, soap scum, dirt, spills, streaks, residues, and hundreds more of life’s messes

USE ON ALL SURFACES: Sparkling, residue-free results on kitchen countertops, bathrooms, high chairs, electronics, smartphones, tablets, hardwood floors, finished wood, car dashboards, wheels, blinds, laminate, chrome, furniture, granite, glass, grills, jewelry, metal, painted surfaces, plastic, porcelain, ovens, quartz, sealed & unsealed stone, sinks, stainless steel, toilets, tables, toys, vinyl, walls, and any other solid surface

100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: Safe for Children, Pets, All Household Surfaces; Natural, non-toxic, hypoallergenic, gluten-free, vegan, biodegradable; Certified Cruelty-Free - Never Tested on Animals; Made in the USA
